title: The Next Fountain-of-Youth Craze? Peptide Injections
author: Sara Ashley O'Brien
description: As influencers share stories of physiological transformations, more people are seeking out experimental treatments: "If I can be a superhero and function at my absolute optimum, why wouldn't I?"
cleaned_text: March 2, 2023 12:00 am ET After decades of turning to diet pills, steroids and plastic surgery to alter their bodies inside and out, people are increasingly open to an alternative method: injecting themselves with peptides at home.
